item.title: Project 4: CEO Salary Analysis
item.description: This projects GitHub repository is available here Project Overview In this project, I defined 4 questions related to ceosal data. I started to answer the questions with an analysis of the data set. I aimed to find the relation between top CEO’s salaries and which type of accounting state of their company, such as Return on Sales, Return on Investments. I conducted my analysis and modeling using R. I also created an HTML output of the analysis using RMarkdown.
